title: Bewitching in Boots
description: Inspired by the tale of Puss in Boots--a hot historical romance novella from the acclaimed Fiery Tales series.Elisabeth de Roussel, daughter of the King, is accustomed to getting what she wants-and she wants gorgeous Tristan de Tiersonnier, Count of Saint-Marcel, the ex-commander of the King's elite private Guard.A recent injury has forced Tristan to leave his distinguished position. But Elisabeth is determined to make him see he's every bit the man he once was-and more than man enough for her...
author: Lila DiPasqua
